                               java.lang.String clientSecret,

        Initiate Peppertalk.
        Parameters:
        clientId - CLIENT_ID from the getpeppertalk dashboard
        clientSecret - CLIENT_SECRET from the getpeppertalk dashboard
        userId - - User ID to registered the device with. All conversations will be initiated from this user.
        Returns:
        Peppertalk.Builder to

      • getParticipantUnreadCount
